title: Charging Magic With a Smile~ Infinite Magic Power After Being Reincarnated Into a Different World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Calm Protagonist   Cheats   Childcare   Demi-Humans   Domestic Affairs   Elves   Fantasy World   Game Elements   God Protagonist   Goddesses   Hard-Working Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kingdom Building   Lack of Common Sense   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple Transported Individuals   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Post-apocalyptic   Pregnancy   R-15   S*ave Harem   S*aves   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Miki Nazuna   三木なずな
description: I was summoned to a ruined world and received the ability to create various things. Since I don’t have a house to live in I will make a house. Since people are gathering at my house I will make a town. Since the town is being attacked by monsters I will make the strongest weapon and repel them. Using my infinitely charging magic power I will remake this world as I please.>
